test.instr: (:ins (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X yellow) (sort Y plant))) (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X red) (sort Y closet))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (sort X yellow) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X white))) (:cons_not (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X yellow) (sort Y worktable)))) (:cons_not (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X closet)))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X blue) (sort Y chair))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X red) (sort Y chair))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X red) (sort Y desk))) )
test.nl: There is the yellow book on the plant. There is the red cup in the closet. Close the door of the washmachine. Put the yellow bottle in the refrigerator. Pick up the white remotecontrol. The yellow cup must be not on the worktable. The door of the closet must not be opened. Put the blue can on the chair. Put the black can on the chair. Put the red cup on the desk.
